title: 5 Three-In-One Make-Up Products To Try Right Now
text:
facebook 
As much as we ADORE make-up and beauty, we're lazy girls at the core. So, while we stock up on all kinds of make-up that tickles our fancy, multipurpose products will always be our favourite. One product that takes care of a majority of our daily make-up needs? Yes, please - we'll take it! So, if you're like us, and are looking to fill your handbag with that one life-saving product that functions as three, look no further! Here are five three-in-one make-up products to try right now! Ilia Beauty Multi-Sticks 
These multi-sticks come in six gorgeous shades, from a soft pink to a dark berry. Infused with vitamin E and shea butter, these sticks can be used on the lips, cheeks, and the eyes for a sheer splash of colour. 
Available here MAC Studio Quiktrik Stick 
This dual-ended stick can be used for pretty much anything, from highlighting to contouring to bronzer, and even as blush. One side has a sheer, shimmery shade, while the other, a darker, deeper shade. We're dying to get our hands on these! 
Available here Bite Beauty Multi-stick 
With a whopping 18 shades, these compact multi-sticks are designed to be used anywhere on the face, but primarily on the lips, cheeks, and eyes. They blend easily and are buildable, and can be applied using your fingers or a brush. 
Available here Mineral Fusion 3-in-1 Color Stick 
This all organic multi-stick has a creamy formula, and comes in four pretty colours that can be applied to your eyes, cheeks, and lips. 
Available here CoverGirl Outlast All Day 3-In-1 Foundation 
While not a multi-stick, this foundation is a 3-in-1 product because of its formulation. It works as a primer, concealer, and foundation, all in one, and comes in 14 shades covering varying skin tones.
